attributes.action: Reverse the closure of the Dubs child refugee scheme
attributes.background: The Government has announced the closure of the Dubs scheme after  accepting 350 unaccompanied children yet there are many more lone child refugees still alone and at risk. The scheme could be these children's only lifeline.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
